nodes.text: The Bardottan Sphere was an orb created by the Nightsisters of Dathomir. In 19 BBY, it was used by members of the Frangawl Cult to drain the Living Force from kidnapped members of the Dagoyan Order on the planet Bardotta. Later, the Nightsister Mother Talzin attempted to use the Bardottan Sphere and the captive Queen Julia as part of a ritual on Zardossa Stix to increase her Force powers. Talzin and the Frangawl Cult were thwarted by the Jedi Master Mace Windu and the Gungan Junior Representative Jar Jar Binks.
